Row.Text: Create Admirals to increase the empire's [ICON_JFD_SUPPLY] Unit Supply and to speed the creation of Great Admirals.
Create Generals to increase the empire's [ICON_JFD_SUPPLY] Unit Supply and to speed the creation of Great Generals.
This order will consume the unit and grant 2 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains.

A captain is a title for the commander of a military unit, the commander of a ship, airplane, spacecraft, or other vessel, or the commander of a port, fire department or police department, election precinct, etc. Captain is a military rank in armies, navies, coast guards, etc., typically at the level of an officer commanding a company of infantry, a ship, or a battery of artillery, or similar distinct unit.
